parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number of the page to return.

parameters.name: FileCategoryCode
parameters.description: The code of the file type.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance to which the OSS object belongs.

> You can call the **DescribeInstances** operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: LastScanTimeEnd
parameters.description: The end time of the last scan. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: LastScanTimeStart
parameters.description: The start time of the last scan. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Marker
parameters.description: When you query data by page, use the `Marker` parameter to query the data that follows the `Marker` value.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The search keyword. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: RiskLevelId
parameters.description:
The sensitivity level of the OSS object. Valid values:

*   **1**: N/A, which indicates that no sensitive data is detected.
*   **2**: S1, which indicates the low sensitivity level.
*   **3**: S2, which indicates the medium sensitivity level.
*   **4**: S3, which indicates the high sensitivity level.
*   **5**: S4, which indicates the highest sensitivity level.

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description:
The ID of the sensitive data detection rule that the OSS object hits.

> You can call the **DescribeRules** operation to query the ID of the sensitive data detection rule.

parameters.name: ServiceRegionId
parameters.description: The region in which the data asset resides.

parameters.name: TemplateId
parameters.description: The ID of the industry-specific rule template.
